productData.title: boAt Airdopes 141, Low Latency, ENx Tech, 42HRS Battery, Fast Charge, IWP, IPX4, v5.1 Bluetooth Earbuds, TWS Ear Buds Wireless Earphones with mic (Bold Black)
productData.description: Playback- Enjoy an extended break on weekends with your favourite episodes on stream, virtue of a playback time of up to 42 hours including the 6 hours nonstop playtime for earbuds.     Low Latency- Our BEAST mode makes Airdopes 141 a partner in entertainment with real-time audio and low latency experience. These tws earbuds are your companion for a perfect gaming experience.     Clear Voice Calls- It dons built-in mic on each earbud along with our ENx Environmental Noise Cancellation tech that

adScript.problem: Tired of your earbuds dying mid-binge or lagging during gaming sessions? Background noise and poor call quality ruining your flow?
adScript.solution: boAt Airdopes 141 offers up to 42 hours of playback, ultra-low latency for gaming, and ENx Tech for crystal-clear calls—so you stay connected and immersed, always.
benefits: Low latency BEAST mode for gamers
ENx Tech ensures crystal-clear voice calls
adScript.callToAction: Level up your audio—grab yours now!
